sentences.english: The perceptual shape of the light appearing elusively in the dark, a unique charm of optic artistry.
sentences.chinese: 黑夜里若隐若现的感性造型，独具光影艺术魅力。

sentences.english: All the optical effects have disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 所有的光影效果都不见了。

sentences.english: The delicate fiber-shaped structure recreates the interlacing shadows of the bamboo forest.
sentences.chinese: 微细纤维状造型，交错编织光影时空。

sentences.english: In the windows, the bright colors combined with light to form lovely patterns and shadows.
sentences.chinese: 这种剪纸色泽明艳贴在窗子上光影效果极佳。

sentences.english: Reflection of old housing as black and white ink paintings.
sentences.chinese: 枕河人家如墨色般倒影在黑白斑驳的光影中。

sentences.english: Ligt shade description is a main expression method of photograph art.
sentences.chinese: 光影描绘是摄影艺术的主要表现方法。

sentences.english: I closed my eyes and could almost feel the flicker of the light on my eyelids.
sentences.chinese: 就算闭著眼，我也几乎感觉得到光影在我眼皮上跳动。

sentences.english: Wheatfield time, listening to the voice of alternating light and shadow quietly.
sentences.chinese: 麦田时光，静静倾听光影交错的声音。

sentences.english: The late afternoon sun shone through the leaves of the giant oak tree, casting its flickering light on the cabin.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳穿过大橡树的叶子，光影闪烁地照在小木屋上。

sentences.english: Light and shade are on everything.
sentences.chinese: 光影附着在一切事物上。

sentences.english: The shadow cast by the golden table lamp is so quiet that it leaves you intoxicated.
sentences.chinese: 金座台灯投下的光影，安静得教人熏然。

sentences.english: Everything you see reflects light and casts some sort of shadow.
sentences.chinese: 你看到的每样东西都是通过光影反射形成它的形象。

sentences.english: People stared in slack-jawed amazement at the light show.
sentences.chinese: 人们张口瞠目地注视著光影闪烁表演。

sentences.english: Floral art: Brilliant and bright flowers spring up in the Botanical Gardens at Kew Garden.
sentences.chinese: 英国伦敦皇家植物园邱园前的光影花朵。

sentences.english: The ground under the trees was checkered with sunlight and shade.
sentences.chinese: 树林下的地上光影交错。
欣赏2，光影和质感非常好。

definition: lit. flowing light and overflowing color/brilliant lights and vibrant colors (idiom)
